tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you doesn't seem enough for the care and kindness Doctor shown my sister during her treatment. His skill as an orthopedic surgeon is unmatched, but it's his warmth, humility, and unwavering support that truly make him a gem of a person. He has not just healed her foot, but uplifted her spirit. Grateful beyond words!" Would definitely recommend Dr. Pardeep Bageja! üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In August-2017 I slipped from stares and my ankle got twisted by 360 degrees, in this process two Bones of my left Ankle (Tibia & Fibula) got broken. I was immediately rushed to Maharaja Agrasen Hospital Dwarka and there we met Dr. Pardeep Bageja. After initial investigations of the x-ray reports he explained that the fracture is severe and I had to undergo a surgery and some internal fixation needs to be done to make the ankle functional. The surgery was planned after two days of fracture and I was very anxious about the surgery and OT. Dr. Bageja nullified that horrifying experience by his friendly nature with his patient, More over he is very cool with the OT staff and very vigilant in the process, I could recall that he engages with all the people in the OT and keep them self motivated to learn and perform well in his procedure. 
Post surgery I use to visit him on regular intervals for routine checkups and also arranged the change of dressing at my hone. Throughout the process he ensured that the recovery should be least painful and it should be perfect in all respects so as to avoid future complications. I was very much satisfied with my complete treatment procedure and appreciate doctor's effort during my treatment.
reply_text: Thanks Rahul for your Positive testimonial and I appreciate your critical observation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Had a wonderful Experience with the Doctor. He recently performed a high risk surgery on my Grandmother who is 88 years old . She fell and fractured her hip bone, and surgery was the only way to treat her. Once all the pre-tests were done, it was concluded that she is highly unfit for the surgery due to her heart condition as well, hence Anesthesiologist refused to proceed. However,  the Doctor was very confident that he could perform the surgery , which speaks volumes about his experience and skills in his field. This put a lot of confidence in us as well and we were ready to go ahead with the surgery , Although we had to move my grandmother to a different hospital in which the Doctor also helped us a lot.

Finally the surgery was successfully done and my Grandmother is safe and back home, still recovering though. However, the Doctor is still in touch with us for all the post operation procedures.

He indeed is great and supremely skilled in his field, and the best thing I appreciate and grateful for is that he stayed in touch ever after the treatment was over and happy to help and answer any concerns we have over the phone , Highly recommended !!
reply_text: Good morning Vinay Thanks for your time and kind words ,I just do my job with full faith in Almighty God üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been a patient of Dr Bageja for the last 12 years regarding all my Ortho problems .
Recently  i was suffering from frozen shoulder.For my severe shoulder pain I tried many treatments like physiotherapy acupressure home remedies n medication but all in vain.
Finally I went to Dr Bageja with much hope as usual.
There was tremendous improvement within 15
days.my pain was hocus -pocus with a single injection.
Mobility of shoulder is increasing day by day.
Wonderful experience.he is very pleasant, kind ,caring and down to earth doctor.He listens to the patient and explains the line of treatment thoroughly.
More over he doesn't run after money that is his uniqueness .
Thank God I m in the safest hands 
I will highly recommend Dr Bageja for all Ortho problems as per my experience.
Gratitude!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to see Dr. Pradeep for pain in hips and lower back that didn't go away after 5 months of self medication. He correctly diagnosed  the condition even before I shared the MRI & blood test results with him. He explained the affected joints with a diagram and provided detailed description about the medication. I was not sure if I could get rid of the pain permanently with only medicines but after 2 months of taking the medicines prescribed by Dr. Pradeep I stopped feeling pain when doing my daily activities. Earlier it was painful to take even a single step but now I can walk several kilometers without any pain or discomfort.
reply_text: Thanks Aman for Positive Testimonial and your Precious time

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My husband had minor slip disc problem. He was called thrice in a week and charged everytime ******* ** ******* *** ***** *** *** ******** ** only thing done in second visit was prescribing MRI ***** ***** **** **** **** ** *** ***** ** ** ****** Third visit was to just show the MRI reports. No doctor has ever charged from me for seeing the reports only ********* * **** ** *** *** ******* ** ****** **** **** ********* **** ** * ****** 
Besides, doctor was polite and had explained the problem clearly.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback  Regarding fees and consultation you have full right to ask whether every visit is chargeable or not you will be given full information. Thanks very much you are being honest that your husband has quick recovery .Doctor not allowed to advised MRI SCAN on phone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am so impressed with Dr. Pardeep Bageja for keeping my hope alive during this stressful time when I was dealing with intense pain in my left lower leg and foot .Doctor I would like to thank you for excellent care and treatment and making me feel better in such a short period of time .I am exceedingly satisfied with your professionalism, I am so blessed to have a very good doctor. Thank you again, you are the most amazing doctor I have ever met.
I would definitely recommend Dr. Pardeep Bageja to anyone with orthopaedic needs. he is very pleasant, kind and caring while treatment. he explains everything thoroughly. His non-greedy attitude makes him unique, which is very rare to find now these days, I am thankful to be in his capable hands as he truly loves his job.
Best Regards 
Harminder Kaur
reply_text: Thanks for your positive Testimonial

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I came from Afghanistan looking for an orthopedic doctor for treatment of habitual shoulder dislocation, before him I visited many other places and doctors but when I met him I made my mind to undergo surgery with him only, he made me feel comfortable and was in continues communication with me before and now after the surgery. He explained everything to me clearly about the procedure and things went the way that he advised.
If you have any orthopedic related issues I would advise you to visit him once I am sure you will not regret it.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words and appreciation

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
So around two weeks ago, I fell and hurt my right chest area really bad. I tried all the pain killers and relief gels however, nothing really worked. One day someone recommended me to Consult with Dr. Bageja and i guess that was the best decision ever made. My pain started reducing after just 2 doses and within 2-3 days i was back to normal with no pain at all. He was extremely patient and friendly and I would recommend him to everyone who‚Äôs looking for a great treatment not just doctor.

Thanks you Dr. Bageja !
reply_text: Thanks for Positive Testimonial and I really appreciate that

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My mother had severe pain in her left heel while walking, she was suffering due to a heal spur. 
For further treatment found Dr. Bageja through internet, saw the good reviews on practo and went for a diagnosis. Must say all the reviews guided us well, he is a very good doctor, friendly, approachable, explained the situation well, medicines he prescribed has really helped my mother and her heel pain has reduced many folds.
It has been almost 3 months since we started with Dr. Bageja's treatment, and are very satisfied with it.

review: I would recommend Dr. Pradeep to any and everybody. I cannot explain in words how much relieved I am from my knee and joint pain. I know that all the doctors and staff are experts in their field,but Dr. Pradeep always has a great concern for his patients. Its always a pleasant expeience to visit him. I have complete trust in his evaluations and treatment. Would not go anywhere else for the treatment. Unlike other doctors he dnt pursuade me for operation rather motivates me to go for a walk with oral medication.
reply_text: Thanks for Positive feedback

tags: None
review: Met him about a month ago after suffering from a severe back pain. I must say that he is super friendly and does make you feel comfortable. He asked me about my family and profession. To me it was quite surprising because one can barely expect such a humbling experience from a doctor. Back then I didn't know that I am suffering from an untreatable condition called "Fibrositis", but now I do. I am still in a lot of pain and hoping to find a cure for this illness. Thank you so much doc for everything.
reply_text: Thanks for testimonial

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Just being honest. I sorted Dr Pardeep out of 30+ doctors and I am thankful to practo for leading me to such an amazing experienced doctor who not only explained throughly but also the worry I had for almost two years now suddenly vanished after meeting him. 

He was sure to explain us every precise detail and further medication required. He took enough time to read the x-ray and MRI report.
I am definitely going to recommend him among my knowns.

tags: Value for money,
review: Doctor is friendly and did checkup well. All the prescribed medicine was available in the clinic itself and handed me the same. But the moment I asked for bill/receipt doctor refused to give any of those medicines because he was concerned about GST, ******** ****** *** ********* ** ******* I had to look for medicines in other stores in acute pain, one of them which is unavailable in stores and Also online stores. Also, for two xray report I have been charged ‚Çπ1400 (not sure if this is the standard amount elsewhere). Surprising fact, MRI was mentioned in the prescription which neither doctor nor the receptionist cared to tell me about. It was only when I noticed I insisted to enquire. And, response received was -"it is to be done in the next check up". ** **** **** *** *** **** *** *** **** ****** ******* **** **** **** ******* ** ******** Also, it was mentioned in back of the prescription and in between the medicines prescribed, which makes it difficult for a patient to notice. *** ***** **** **** ** ********** ***** *** ****** *** ****** Also, the receptionist is rude.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind feedback Hope you recovered well I wish for your speedy recovery

review:
On 21st June 2020, I was preparing for solar eclipse live streaming and was about to leave home. Suddenly severe pain started in back. Some investigation were done but of no use as corona made it difficult. Then I contacted Dr Pradeep Bageja and described my problem. He suggested some.pain killers and medicines along with an advice for an MRI scan after 3 or 4 days, if relief is not experienced. But fortunately it worked and I got ok and routine also became normal in one week without any pain. No MRI later also.
Thanks Dr Pradeep.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Gentlemen, *************, experienced..
Personally recommend if you find any ortho related problem just go for him. 
He listens patients problem calmly and find its cause.
I have not only one problem but combination of 3-4 problems. We were confused for which doctor we should go for all these problems. Then we went to Dr. Bageja he listened my whole problem and asked for current issues. He given me medicines and asked for blood test. After blood test the problem is same for what he is doubting. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Bageja in 2013 for my severe pain in lower back. His medication started giving results pretty soon. Further he advised me some exercise for the back. He detects the core reason for the problem in the first visit itself. He is approachable and friendly by nature where in you can freely ask and discuss about your medical problems. Since then whenever I have any muscle or bone related pain and issues I always reach to him and he is always just a call away. Recently I visited him for my severe pain in the neck and right shoulder and like before his medication healed me pretty soon. It is rare to find such doctor where in you see the result so soon. Highly recommended!!
reply_text: Thanks for your Positive feedback
